amendment.description: Amendment prohibited the use of funds from enforcing the Obama Administration's EPA methane rule.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 43 printed in House Report 115-830 to prohibit the use of funds for enforcing the Obama Administration's EPA Methane Rule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mullin amendment (A039) Agreed to by recorded vote: 215 - 194 (Roll no. 346).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A039) offered by Mr. Mullin.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
